839bef48-5dbf-4661-9117-2dabd1ed95dd.name: 仆从
839bef48-5dbf-4661-9117-2dabd1ed95dd.notes: IQ 为 0 或者有奴性

e1836f12-0911-42c7-90ab-3dc832dbfe9c.name: 感同身受
e1836f12-0911-42c7-90ab-3dc832dbfe9c.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0

c5407b0d-3136-47b8-8884-1308992ec834.name: 感同身受
c5407b0d-3136-47b8-8884-1308992ec834.notes: 一方的死亡将直接把另一方的 HP 降为 0，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

916ade0d-087b-41aa-8d15-a0121339785c.name: 感同身受
916ade0d-087b-41aa-8d15-a0121339785c.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡

0720271e-45e8-49c7-92df-fb27132276ad.name: 感同身受
0720271e-45e8-49c7-92df-fb27132276ad.notes: 一方死亡时另一方也会自动死亡，但是损伤仅影响盟友不影响你

1eb640ba-6740-476d-ad16-fce1de998e30.name: 战斗反射
1eb640ba-6740-476d-ad16-fce1de998e30.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

5648f2a7-2d0c-41c4-9711-2b1c4e1f6cd5.name: 增强招架（@近战武器技能@）

a8a633e6-bdd4-4375-818c-7dca2d302d9a.name: Luck, Extraordinary
a8a633e6-bdd4-4375-818c-7dca2d302d9a.notes: 每三十分钟游戏可以用一次

b29dfbd9-47c9-4c3f-8c30-079ded3acf3c.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

2c5e5a55-daba-49d3-a1c2-a3f83c704fa5.name: 幸运
2c5e5a55-daba-49d3-a1c2-a3f83c704fa5.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

8c7acfff-b2a5-4560-8e50-ec3f3a0aba05.name: Weapon Bond
8c7acfff-b2a5-4560-8e50-ec3f3a0aba05.notes: +1 to effective skill when using @a specific weapon@

7a838e52-42ab-4283-8488-4f6caf479269.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

c6cebab6-9ef7-433f-bf3d-13a32f8c69f5.name: 期待陪伴
c6cebab6-9ef7-433f-bf3d-13a32f8c69f5.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

67520b52-ed26-4292-93c9-fce402e1cdb3.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
67520b52-ed26-4292-93c9-fce402e1cdb3.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

ebad5324-4615-43ef-b8c1-4fc89cada615.name: 执念
ebad5324-4615-43ef-b8c1-4fc89cada615.notes: Become the best  swordsman in the world!

3703d57c-0d1b-46e3-9197-9d866ba1038a.name: Or intensify Code of Honor from Gentleman’s [-10] to Chivalry [-15] for -5 points.

828e799b-6d12-4aa3-92e2-a16e1da8c651.name: Vow (Never refuse a challenge to combat)

792caa98-dff0-4c93-9247-0742c0e6f802.name: Or 1 point to raise one of those skills or any one-point primary or secondary skill by a level.
